name: Customer_Journey_Map_for_CSAT_Stage_Analysis_tp
label: Customer Journey Map for CSAT - Stage Analysis

Customer_CSAT_Journey.label: Customer CSAT Journey

Responsive_customer__1.label: Responsive customer Vs Customer Base

promoters_passives_d_1.label: promoters-passives-detractors over time

Participant_Responsi_1.label: Participant Responsiveness

Date_Parser_1.label: Date Parser

Response_Details_1.label: Response Details

Responses_by_stage_1.label: Responses by stage

CSAT___Customer_Journ_3.label: CSAT - Customer Journey Unique Participants

CSAT___Customer_Journ_2.label: CSAT - Customer Journey KPI

Invites_and_response_1.label: Invites and responses over time

CSAT___Customer_Journ_4.label: CSAT - Customer Journey - Promoters/Detractors/Passives

CSAT_score_change_ana_1.label: CSAT score change analysis
CSAT_score_change_ana_1.query:
q = load "${App.Datasets.SurveyQuestionResponsewithDetails.FullyQualifiedName}";
q = filter q by 'Question_QuestionType' == "Rating";q = filter q by {{column(Customer_CSAT_Journey.selection,["SurveyName"]).asEquality("SurveyVersion_Survey_Name")}} && {{column(Responses_by_stage_1.selection,["SurveyName"]).asEquality("SurveyVersion_Survey_Name")}} && {{column(CSAT___Customer_Journ_4.selection,["SurveyName"]).asEquality("SurveyVersion_Survey_Name")}}; q = group q by ('Id', 'SurveyVersion_Survey_Id', 'SurveyVersionId', 'QuestionId', 'QuestionChoices_Name', 'JourneyConfig_Stage'); q = foreach q generate 'Id' , 'SurveyVersion_Survey_Id', 'SurveyVersionId', 'QuestionId', 'QuestionChoices_Name' as 'QuestionChoices_Name', 'JourneyConfig_Stage', first('CreatedDate_Year') as 'CreatedDate_Year', first('CreatedDate_Month') as 'CreatedDate_Month', first('CreatedDate_Day') as 'CreatedDate_Day',  first('NumberValue') as 'NumberValue'; q = order q by ('SurveyVersion_Survey_Id' asc, 'SurveyVersionId' asc, 'QuestionId' asc, 'QuestionChoices_Name' asc); q = group q by ('Id', 'SurveyVersion_Survey_Id', 'SurveyVersionId', 'QuestionId', 'JourneyConfig_Stage'); q = foreach q generate 'Id' , 'SurveyVersion_Survey_Id', 'SurveyVersionId', 'QuestionId', 'JourneyConfig_Stage', first('CreatedDate_Year') as 'CreatedDate_Year', first('CreatedDate_Month') as 'CreatedDate_Month', first('CreatedDate_Day') as 'CreatedDate_Day', string_to_number(last('QuestionChoices_Name')) as 'Max Rating', round(first('NumberValue')/string_to_number(last('QuestionChoices_Name')),5) as 'Rating%',  first('NumberValue') as 'NumberValue'; q = group q by ('CreatedDate_Year', 'CreatedDate_Month'); q = foreach q generate 'CreatedDate_Year' as 'CreatedDate_Year', 'CreatedDate_Month' as 'CreatedDate_Month', round((sum(sum('Rating%')) over ([..0] partition by all order by ('CreatedDate_Year','CreatedDate_Month'))/sum(count()) over ([..0] partition by all order by ('CreatedDate_Year','CreatedDate_Month')))*{{cell(Scale_1.result, 0, "sum_Scale").asObject()}},2)*20 as 'CSAT Score'; changes = group q by ('CreatedDate_Year', 'CreatedDate_Month'); changes = foreach changes generate 'CreatedDate_Year' + "~~~" +'CreatedDate_Month' as 'CreatedDate_Year~~~CreatedDate_Month', sum('CSAT Score') - coalesce(sum(sum('CSAT Score')) over ([-1..-1] partition by all order by ('CreatedDate_Year','CreatedDate_Month')),0) as 'Change of CSAT Score';

content.displayTemplate: How did the CSAT score across stages trend over time?
* Score normalized to score out of 5
What’s the change in CSAT Score for the selected period?
CUSTOMER SATISFACTION JOURNEY MAP STAGE ANALYSIS
